alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 13 at 10:30AM CST until December 13 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN HUNT AND NORTHERN KAUFMAN COUNTIES... At 1029 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Terrell, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Terrell, Kaufman, Royse City, Crandall, Combine, Talty, Quinlan, Hawk Cove, New Terrell City Lake, Lake Tawakoni, Elmo, Oak Grove, Post Oak Bend City, Union Valley, Oak Ridge, Ola, Lawrence, Cash and Heartland. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for north central Texas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 500 PM CST for north central Texas.
